definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
Lugou Bridge or Marco Polo Bridge in southwest of Beijing, the scene of a conflict that marked the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]

sentences.english: The Lizigou gold deposit in Song Country, western Henan Province, China, belongs to the altered tectonic type ore golden deposit.
sentences.chinese: 豫西嵩縣栗子溝金礦屬於構造蝕變巖型金礦牀。

sentences.english: The region is rich in geothermal water resources, the construction of the trench Shentang Resort.
sentences.chinese: 區內地熱水資源十分豐富，興建了神堂溝渡假村。

sentences.english: The Laodonggou gold deposit in the Erjinaqi, Inner Mongolia is an oxidizing-Leaching type gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古額濟納旗老硐溝礦牀爲氧化淋濾型金礦牀。

sentences.english: We nominate it "the lateral orbital groove" and "the foramen for orbital branch of middle meningeal artery" respectively.
sentences.chinese: 暫分別命名爲“眶外側溝”和“腦膜中動脈眶支孔”。

sentences.english: The south area of Zhaoyuan is situated at between terrace Chaoyanggou and anticlinal belt Changchunling.
sentences.chinese: 肇源南地區位於朝陽溝階地和長春嶺背斜帶之間。

sentences.english: Triple oxidation ditch was used to treat anaerobically digested effluent of piggery wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 研究了T型氧化溝工藝對豬場糞水厭氧出水處理。

sentences.english: In the aspect of practice, a particular analysis on Longdong Gou watershed in Mao County is given.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐方面，論文以茂縣龍洞溝爲例，進行具體分析。

sentences.english: The model has been tested in Sunjiagou watershed as an example.
sentences.chinese: 以孫家溝流域爲例，對建立的優化模型進行了驗證。

sentences.english: In addition, the foramen spinosum and the sulcus of arteria meningea media were also observed.
sentences.chinese: 同時本文還描述了棘孔和腦膜中動脈溝。

sentences.english: Have you found out how wide the ditch will be?
sentences.chinese: 你瞭解到這條溝將來有多寬嗎？

sentences.english: A ravine delimited the property on the south.
sentences.chinese: 一條溝作爲南邊那塊地產的邊界。

sentences.english: The steric and staticelectro interaction is the main factors leading to the enantioselectivity.
sentences.chinese: 然而，空間作用是導致溝選擇性的主要因素。

sentences.english: With everybody helping, they had the ditch covered in in no time.
sentences.chinese: 由於大家幫忙，他們一下子就把那條溝填滿了。

sentences.english: They jumped (over) the ditch without much difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 他們不太喫力地就跳過了那道溝。

sentences.english: Luo Xia Gou is in Yunnan Province, 250km from Kunming City.
sentences.chinese: 落霞溝位於雲南省，距離昆明市250公里。

sentences.english: For flushing canal by slop runoff, must build the cut off ditch.
sentences.chinese: 由於坡水引起的沖刷，則需修建截流溝。

definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
